title: Chalmers
what: BSc and MSc in Software Engineering
description: Broad education that has given me a base on which I feel confident to tackle any challenge. I have learnt the fundamentals of software engineering, specific tools and frameworks, how to effectively communicate as an engineer and team member, and much more.

skills.text: Introduction to data science and AI

title: Z-order Curve-based Traffic Event Detection Using Deep Learning
description: Explored a novel approach leveraging machine learning and space-filling curves for traffic event retrieval from large-scale, unlabelled video data. Contributed to the development of driver assistance systems (including autonomous driving) by helping companies get value from their collected traffic data. In collaboration with Volvo Cars. Collaboration with 1 other student.

title: weave
description: Ideated and developed a collaborative game for a game development project course. Players control a line and have to stay alive as long as possible by avoiding each other and obstacles. I contributed to several areas of the development but my main focus was on the UI and interaction design. Collaboration with 5 other students.

title: Hospital Visualization and Prediction
description: Created a tool for hospitial visualization and overview. My focus was a neural network developed to predict patient flow based on historical data. On behalf of Norra Älvsborgs Länssjukhus. Collaboration with 5 other students.
